Text: Aigerims Potential Adoptive Family Cc is a couple in Michigan who is interested in adopting Aigerim they hosted a year old boy now and will be traveling to get him in March and theyve decided to bring home a second child i told all that i knew and sent pictures if you have any stories or comments to advocate for Aigerim please contact Kathy Scoby at thanks i wouldve called but im trying to pack
